edu.cs495.engine

Class GameDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cs495.engine.GameDriver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class GameDriver
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The GameDriver object handles the game logic loop, starts the game, and holds references to important data that may be used
    Version:
    February 2019
    Author:
    Spencer
